response.overview: a ccouple lives in a abandoned place, far away from the Human population. Ahmed(Husband) beats his wife (Afreen) daily and locks her inside a small room and tie her with ropes Afreen accuses Ahmed being possessed by Jins. then a Demonologist name Mustafa reaches there to help them as he gets a call of help from Ahmed accusing her wife being possessed by the Jins. now who is actually possessed is a mystery. and why would someone will leave everything and will start living in a abandoned place. and from where this Jin came from? and who is this Jin? what he wants? or is it a Black Magic trap?
response.title: Whammy
